It seems that I can mute topics in streams I subscribe to, however I can't subscribe to a replies in a specific stream that I don't want to subscribe to?
GitHub allows both and they are both needed: I can ignore an issue thread in a repo I watch, and I can subscribe to an issue thread in a repo I don't watch.
Unfortunately, thereâ€™s no mechanism to do that at the moment.
what I do is to subscribe to the stream and then mute it
There's an issue for this that's being worked on: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/6027
